ingredients.item: 200g Waitrose Duchy Organic Baby Potatoes, sliced
1 Waitrose Duchy Organic Leek, sliced (selected stores)

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan, and fry the potatoes and leek for 5 minutes. Add the stock and sweetcorn, cover and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Stir in the diced cod and milk, and simmer for 5 minutes until the fish is just cooked and the potatoes are tender. Season and add the chives.
